componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
ACCOUNT IN LITIGATION


This deal has been identified in association to an investigation. It requires that we preserve all relevant information in connection with the Account, Contact, and/or Deal information. Please do not delete or modify information related to this Account, Contact(s), and/or Deal(s)

 

In addition, please do not discuss the investigation with contacts from this deal should he/she contacts you in connection to details associated to this account.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Do Not Lend

This Account has been tagged as "Do Not Lend". For further details, please refer to Legal Team or Executive Team Member. Check the Notes Tab on the Account as it may also contain details regarding the reason.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: REFER TO ASSET MANAGEMENTï»¿

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Property Level Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Document_Type__c LIKE '%IC Memo%' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Background and Credit Search' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Portfolio Level Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Principle Loan Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Recorded Loan Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Current Vested Owner' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'DS Funding Package' AND Is_Deleted__c = false
